div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `Annotation` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Annotation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`. Element `Annotation.author[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.author[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`.
Element `Annotation.time` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.time`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Annotation.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.text`, but has no comparisons.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: FHIR R5 ComplexType `Annotation` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Annotation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`. Element `Annotation.author[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.author[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`.
